price: So do not be in haste about them; We are surely counting down their days[24].
arabic: فَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمۡ عَدّٗا
footnotes: [24] i.e., their breaths or evil deeds.
